message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You got lucky, I'll give you a small advantage this round
You're trying to take advantage of me? I'll give you a slightly better deal this time
You're getting desperate, I'll meet you in the middle this time
You're getting closer, but I'm not there yet. Let's try again
I think we've danced around this long enough, let's finally meet in the middle
